document_data.name: Djaffar
document_data.source: [[The North: Guide to the Savage Frontier|TN:GSF]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Djaffar''', or '''Djassar''',<ref group="note">''[[Volo's Guide to the North]]'' refers to "Djassar" (p.153) as one of the Hammers, but ''[[The Thousand Orcs]]'' describes "Djaffar" (p.53). This is likely to be the same person, so the name from the newer source is given here. was the leader of the [[Hammers]], the [[Marchion]] of [[Mirabar]]'s personal defence.
document_data.Description: Djaffar wore a plumed open-faced helmet.
document_data.Relationships: Djaffar was known to eye of [[Shoudra Stargleam]] in a romantic fashion, though it was not known if Shoudra felt the same way.
